content.rendered:
Directed by Rakesh Chaturvedi Om.

Written by Neeraj Badhwar. Sanjeev Giriwer. Satyavrat Mudgal. Rakesh Chaturvedi Om. Rakesh Chaturvedi Om.

Cast Ujjwal Rana(Pawan Bhalla). Inshika Bedi(Pooja Badlani). Manoj Pahwa(Lovely Khanna). Seema Pahwa(Neelam Khanna (as Seema Bhargava Pahwa)). Raj Arjun(Gagan Bhalla). Brijendra Kala(Moti Bagga). Nirmala J. Chandra(Rosy D’Costa). Nayani Dixit(Rani). Yashpal Sharma(Babbu Khan). Benjamin Gilani(C.P. Badlani). Guddu Tripathi(Jugnu). K.K. Shukla(Chintan Mhatre). Rasika Agashe(Panna Bagga). Dilshad Zahid Khan(Security Guard). Sukhwinder Chahal(Makkad). Sanjeev Wilson(Tony D’Costa). Balvinder Panesar(Mrs. C.P. Badlani). Om Prakash Singh(Umesh Shukla). Rajinder Sharma(Dhaba Owner).Deepti Pujari.Sangeeta Yadav.Seema Yadav . K K Shukla(Chintan Mahatre)

Language Hindi.

Producers Ravi Chaturvedi. Rakesh Chaturvedi Om. Amit Rokad. Dhiraj Rokad. Anand Tiwari. Ashok Tripathi.

Production GM Film Productions. RCOM Productions.
